    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
The match between Ath Bilbao and Real was a dynamic and fiercely contested game where Real emerged victorious with a 2-1 scoreline. The first half started with Real kicking off the game at the sound of the referee’s whistle. 

The opening moments saw Real committing a foul just over a minute into the game. This allowed Ath Bilbao to take an indirect free-kick, although it did not result in a goal-scoring opportunity. Ath Bilbao’s corner at the 2:31 mark was foiled by a foul on their part, giving Real an indirect free-kick to relieve the pressure.

Real had faced another tackle just past the third minute when Ath Bilbao committed a foul, giving Real another free-kick. This period was a mix of defensive plays, with multiple instances of the ball going out of play coupled with throw-ins and clearances by both teams. Atletico Bilbao’s aggressive approach gave Real another indirect free-kick at 5:12, though this was soon followed by the ball going out of play and an Ath Bilbao throw-in.

Real then started to find their rhythm, orchestrating their first shot on target at 6:31. Although it did not ripple the net, it signaled Real’s intent. This effort was followed by a series of attempts, including a corner at 6:57 and a shot off-target just a moment later. Ath Bilbao seemed rock-solid in defense, managing a clearance at 7:23 and continuously defending against the probing play of Real.

The game saw some more physicality with fouls and numerous free-kicks being awarded to both sides. In the thick of this, Real managed another shot on target at the 11:00 mark, keeping the Ath Bilbao keeper on his toes. Real’s attacking persistence was apparent with further offensive play, involving shots off-target at the 13:20 and 18:25 marks. Yet, it was in the 18:37 timeline when Real’s determination bore fruit. A shot on target hit the back of the net, bringing the scoreline to Ath Bilbao 0 - 1 Real. This goal signified the first breakthrough in the match.

The game resumed with Ath Bilbao kicking off. The following moments were littered with fouls from the Ath Bilbao side, giving Real ample indirect free-kicks. One of the spectacular instances came at the 21:27 mark when Real fired another shot on target, though it did not score another goal this time.

Ath Bilbao seemed to struggle in maintaining composure as another foul led to an indirect free-kick awarded to Real at 24:59. Meanwhile, Real's goalkeeper remained vigilant, and their defense focused on clearing the ball whenever threatened. A late surge by Ath Bilbao towards the end of the first half saw them take a shot on target at 30:41, followed by a corner. This attempt failed to breach Real's defensive fortress.

Continuing their assault, Real took several shots on target, managing to test Ath Bilbao's keeper and defense multiple times. Real's intense offensive play was marked by consistent ball possession, aggressive shots, and tactical throw-ins. The first half ended with Real leading 1-0, having put up an impressive performance both in attack and defense.

The second half began with Ath Bilbao initiating the proceedings. A quick succession of fouls and indirect free-kicks kept the referees busy early in the half. At 6:39, Real saw their first yellow card for a foul. Ath Bilbao capitalized on this momentum, taking a direct free-kick and a shot on target within the seventh minute, necessitating a clearance from Real.

The game took an intense turn with continuous play disruptions due to fouls, throw-ins, and corners. Ath Bilbao bolstered their aggression, earning themselves cards and setting up indirect free-kicks for Real. Despite the mounting fouls, Real held their ground firmly. It wasn’t until the 21:55 mark of the second half when Ath Bilbao succeeded, reaping the reward of consistent efforts with a spectacular goal that positioned the score to 1-1.

However, Real's grit was afresh as the match continued. They showcased impeccable resilience and within the next frame, a swift counter led to Real scoring again. This move resumed Real’s lead at 2-1 in the 24:37 minute of the second half. Ath Bilbao resumed the play but continuously faced tough defense and tactical obstructions posed by Real.

With both teams employing substitutions to bring fresh legs onto the field, the intensity didn’t wane. Real staved off several shots from Ath Bilbao, including a precision effort at 29:24, which necessitated a decisive save. A string of corner kicks and throw-ins also demonstrated Ath Bilbao's relentless pursuit. However, Real’s defense stayed strong, clearing ball after ball, and preventing Ath Bilbao from finding the back of net again.

Several attacking attempts characterized the closing minutes, sprinkled with fouls leading to both direct and indirect free kicks. Both teams saw a stream of yellow cards, with multiple free-kicks being awarded. The match seemed to inch towards a climax when the formidably structured defense from Real denied any more equalizing goals from Ath Bilbao.

As the final moments approached, Real continued to counter whenever Ath Bilbao tried to build an offensive play. Despite the aggressiveness, fouls, and cards, Real managed to hold onto their lead. When the referee blew the final whistle, Real emerged the victors with a 2-1 scoreline.

The contest was a beautiful representation of the tension and thrilling nature of football. Both teams displayed immense skills, tactical prowess, and a determination that kept the fans on edge throughout the 90 minutes. With goals from both halves and a consistently challenging midfield challenge, Real’s performance was lauded not just for their scoring but also for their defensive solidity.

Ultimately, this match showcased the beautiful game in its true spirit, where both Ath Bilbao and Real put forth performances that were compelling, capturing the essence of competitive football, with Real walking away with a hard-fought victory on this momentous occasion.
